document.full_text: fourth-seeded briton andy murray made a string of unforced errors before defeating french qualifier eric prodon 6-4 6-1 6-3 in the first round of the french open on tuesday.
document.title: murray labors before overcoming french qualifier
lines_and_colors: fourth-seeded briton andy murray made a string of unforced errors before defeating french qualifier eric prodon 6-4 6-1 6-3 in the first round of the french open on tuesday.
